subtitle: hi my name is lauren finkelstein and
rabbi simon jacobson has been a
angel in my life a real heavenly guy in
2001 i was close to a suicide bomb
saboros in jerusalem where 18 people
were killed and i went to rabbi simon
jacobson shortly after that and i said i
really want to do something meaningful
with my life i don't know what to do i
was so lost
and the rabbi said to me take your tv
skills and use it to help other people
right after that my non-profit was born
save one person save the world where we
highlight one different person in the
media who needs life-saving help and
then later it morphed into people who
need living organ donors
so as a result of that there are
many people who received living organ
donors and it originated from rabbi
simmons jacobson's health advice
sage advice he has touched my life he
has
touched countless other lives
and
not only are people spiritually alive as
a result of his worry but people are
physically alive as a result of his work
and i just want to say thank you rabbi
jacobson for being part of my life being
such an influence and
you are an angel here on earth
[Music]
you
